comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: The caption should be Bob Moha. I can't find any boxers named Bob Mona, but Bob Moha (1890-1959) was a Milwaukee-based middleweight who fought professionally from 1906 to 1922. His birth name was Robert Mucha. BoxRec bout page Cyber Boxing Zone thumbnail bio.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks! We'll fix the boxer's name in the source data and reload the description.
